CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 5, 1958, pg. 5 reads: "7. The Krey representative Jim Savery, introduced delicious chitterlings in cans to the fair visitors"
TitMainTitle: Jim Savery standing next to display for Krey canned meats at booth in Syria Mosque for the 1958 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
